Package it.unibo.oop.lab.anonymous1

Class TestAnonymousComparator

java.lang.Object
it.unibo.oop.lab.anonymous1.TestAnonymousComparator
public final class TestAnonymousComparator extends Object
Instruction: define two comparators as anonymous classes in oder to sort a list of user in the appropriate way. 1) Study carefully the test in order to understand it 2) Introduce the anonymous comparator where required in order to make the test succeed. (Refer to: 13-Advanced-Mechanisms.pdf, slide 39)
